data: Here are examples of ideas for an AI product: Features: 'Real-time alerts', 'Data analytics'. Architecture: 'Modular design', 'Scalable infrastructure'. Generate at least 20 ideas (3 words maximum) for each of these categories: Features, Architecture, Risks, Business (Goals, Markets, Users, Targets). Highlight key ideas for each category using the following information: %%source

__meta__.comments: This file should contain a template using the %%source placeholder for few-shot prompting.
